src:
Man of the Match AC Milan vs Lazio: Luis Alberto
04 Nov 2019, 06:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang asal Spanyol Luis Alberto layak dinobatkan sebagai pemain terbaik alias Man of the Match di laga antara AC Milan vs Lazio, Senin (04/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Milan menjamu Lazio di San Siro di giornata 11 Serie A. Pertandingan ini berlangsung dengan ketat.
Milan dan Lazio saling gempur di babak pertama. Namun di babak kedua skuat Simone Inzaghi sedikit berada di atas angin dalam penguasaan bola.
Lazio unggul lebih dahulu di babak pertama ini melalui sepakan Ciro Immobile pada menit ke-25. Milan bisa membalas melalui bunuh diri Bastos pada menit ke-28.
Gol baru tercipta lagi pada menit ke-83, namun untuk Lazio. Milan pun tak bisa membalas dan harus menerima kekalahan kedua di era Stefano Pioli berkuasa.
text:
Man of the Match AC Milan vs Lazio: Luis Alberto
Nov 04 2019, 06:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Spanish midfielder Luis Alberto deserves to be named the best player aka Man of the Match in the match between AC Milan vs Lazio, Monday (11/04/2019) early morning hrs.
Milan entertain Lazio at the San Siro in giornata 11 Serie A. This match takes place strictly.
Milan and Lazio fought each other in the first round. But in the second half Simone Inzaghi's squad had the upper hand in possession.
Lazio took the lead in the first half by kicking Ciro Immobile in the 25th minute. Milan can retaliate through Bastos suicide in the 28th minute.
A new goal was created again in the 83rd minute, but for Lazio. Milan also could not reply and had to accept a second defeat in the era of Stefano Pioli in power.
